scripts.build: tsc && yarn parcel build build/sidepanel.js build/background.js
scripts.clear: rm -rf build/ build-test/ dist/ extension/ extension.* .parcel-cache/
scripts.package: yarn build && sh prepare_extension.sh && rm -f extension.zip && zip -r extension.zip extension/*
scripts.test: yarn tsc -p ./tsconfig.test.json && yarn parcel build --dist-dir build-test/dist/ build-test/js/*.test.js && npx jasmine-browser-runner runSpecs
scripts.test-local: yarn tsc -p ./tsconfig.test.json && yarn parcel build --dist-dir build-test/dist/ build-test/js/*.test.js && npx jasmine-browser-runner serve
